snippet.title: Grounded - The Shroom & Doom Update - Xbox & Bethesda Games Showcase 2021
snippet.description:
The Grounded Shroom & Doom Update is available June 30. Play it with Xbox Game Pass.
https://www.xbox.com/games/grounded

Befriend pets, build castles, unlock achievements, fight the Broodmother, and so much more, in one of our biggest updates to Grounded yet, coming June 30. Play Grounded today in Xbox Game Preview with Xbox Game Pass.

Subscribe to Xbox 🎮  https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

Follow Xbox on other channels:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Xbox
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/Xbox
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Xbox

AUDIO DESCRIPTION: https://youtu.be/HxRykr4AiwA
